name: KrishnaCChecker
description: One of the best Userbot & Updated Version Of Krishna Userbot Making By Krishna  for Telegram. Now Its Known For Carding Hacking And Many More Deploy And Enjoy.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

ABUSE.description: Leave it blank if you dont want Profanity in Braintree-CC-Checker. Else Fill ON.

APP_ID.description: Yeh Box Ko fill karne ke liye iss url pe jaao my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Yeh Box Ko fill karne ke liye iss url pe jaao my.telegram.org

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API. Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top. Required for updater to work.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot from @BotFather and paste the bot token here.

ALLOWED_IDS.description: Make a bot from @BotFather and paste the bot token here.
